detail_desc: Loose-fitting sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections and a racer back.
Lined triangle bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Imitation suede boots with a fold-down shaft and an opening at the back with a hook and loop fastening. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Metal and fabric earrings with tassels. Length 7.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Small backpack in grained imitation leather with metal details. Zip and handle at the top, a zipped outer compartment and adjustable fabric shoulder straps. Lined. Size approx. 12x20x24.5 cm.

Lightly padded bomber jacket with a lined, detachable hood in sweatshirt fabric and a ribbed stand-up collar. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets with a press-stud, and a zipped pocket on one sleeve. Gathered seams down the sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Scuba sandals that have adjustable straps with a hook and loop fastening over the foot and around the ankle. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and fake fly with decorative buttons.
Soft, non-wired, lace nursing bra with lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.
Tunic in a crêpe weave with a tie-front collar and 3/4-length sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Short, fitted dungaree dress in stretch twill with a zip down the front and straps with adjustable metal fasteners. Soft, detachable belt with a metal buckle and a flap front pocket with a button. Unlined.
Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a sequined appliqué, flap with a hook and loop fastening, and a narrow shoulder strap. Satin lining. Size 4.5x11x13 cm.
Alice band with large, bendable rabbit ears on top.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, long sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped front pockets and ribbed hems.
Cardigan in jersey made from a viscose blend with sequins at the top, long sleeves and a rounded hem. No buttons.
Padded jacket with a detachable, lined hood with a faux fur trim, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Wide jumper in a soft jacquard knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in soft, organic cotton jersey with a hood, chest pocket and press-studs down the front.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck, press-studs at the top and long sleeves.
Gently fitted jacket in woven fabric with welt pockets and a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the front. Sleeves with gathered seams. Lined.
Longjohns in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Shirt in a checked cotton weave with buttons down the front and at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Calf-length dress in crinkled jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a frill-trimmed, smocked bodice and softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with embroidery and appliqués on the knees. Elasticated waist, fake fly, a small coin pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Shirt in an airy linen and cotton blend with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Longer, wide-fitting jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with long sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports trousers in fast-drying, functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Legs with taped details and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless dress in soft, printed cotton jersey with a wider neckline and flounce at the top and over the shoulders. Concealed elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Straight-style jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a small stand-up collar, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Long dress in airy chiffon with a deep V-neck that has a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the bottom. Gathers at the shoulders for a gentle draping effect, long balloon sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Seam with narrow, concealed elastication at the waist, and a gently flared skirt.
Sarong in an airy weave. Size 140x150 cm.
Longer shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.

Short, wide dress in crinkled chiffon with a grandad collar and button placket. Long sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a tiered skirt. Lined with a short, V-neck underdress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Shirt in a soft viscose weave with a chest pocket, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a tie detail at the hem.
V-neck T-shirt in premium cotton jersey.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
Shorts in cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a double-layered yoke. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Narrow cut at the top and a cut-out section at the back.
Slim-fit, high-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), button fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave containing some linen. Smocking with a small frill trim at the top, short raglan sleeves, decorative buttons down the front and covered elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs and hem.

Blouse in airy crêpe with a small stand-up collar with ties at the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and concealed buttons down the front. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Shirt in soft, gently draping silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Satin-covered Alice band with faux fur pompoms on top.
Top in a rib-knit viscose blend with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at one side, and 3/4-length sleeves.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Thong briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a gathered neckline and short puff sleeves.
One-shoulder top in cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top.
Short top in sweatshirt fabric with motifs, a hood with a wrapover front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a round, ribbed neckline.
Fitted, short-sleeved top in ribbed jersey with a round neckline and button placket.
Loose-fitting, V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with short sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a high collar and hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, patch front pockets with a flap and press-stud, and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Partially concealed tab with a button and inner ribbing at the cuffs, and a concealed, elasticated drawstring at the waist. Lined.

Jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and long raglan sleeves. Unlined. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Hipster briefs in lace with a mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Suit trousers in a cotton weave with an extended waistband with adjustable elastication and concealed fastening. Zip fly and button, side pockets, fake back pockets with a flap and button and legs with creases.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a collar, V-shaped opening at the front, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Long jacket in a soft weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short top in crushed velvet with a round neck and long sleeves.

Jeans in washed, stretch denim. Skinny fit with a soft, adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Short dress in woven fabric with a square neckline and smocked bodice. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Short, gently tailored coat in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and no buttons. Lined.
